text: Macy Rodman is an American singer-songwriter, comedian, podcaster, and performance artist. Her music is usually punk and rock. She has released three studio albums, The Lake (2017), Endless Kindness (2019), and Unbelievable Animals (2021). Rodman is a transgender woman. ==References== Category:Living people Category:People from Juneau, Alaska Category:Musicians from Alaska Category:Comedians from Alaska Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Alaska Category:Writers from Alaska Category:American rock singers Category:American punk musicians Category:Podcasters Category:Drag queens Category:1989 births
title: Macy Rodman
